headline: eBay (NasdaqGS:EBAY) Sees 12% Weekly Decline Amid Market Uncertainty
summary: eBay (NasdaqGS:EBAY) recently experienced a price decline of 12%, mirroring the broader market trend exacerbated by the new tariff impositions that caused overall market volatility. Amidst this backdrop, tech stocks like Apple and Tesla saw gains leading the sector but were counterbalanced by declines in other areas like banking and pharmaceuticals. Given these sectoral shifts, eBay's performance aligns with the generally downward trajectory seen across many industries sensitive to trade...

headline: Material World: Ebay Awards Refiberd
summary: Rheom Materials dropped two biobased, rodeo-ready looks while MycoWorks' mycelium offering locked in its first go-to-market integration with Ligne Roset.

headline: Strength Seen in MYT Netherlands Parent (MYTE): Can Its 7.5% Jump Turn into More Strength?
summary: MYT Netherlands Parent (MYTE) was a big mover last session on higher-than-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions might not help the stock continue moving higher in the near term.

headline: eBay invests $300k in Refiberd to drive circular fashion solutions
summary: Today, global marketplace and leading destination for branded pre-loved fashion, eBay, is investing USD$300,000 into Refiberd in its ongoing efforts to support fashion startups to scale circular solutions through its global Circular Fashion Fund program.
